author: Psychoinmyhouse
post_text: June 2, 2019 at 9:28 PM#1Hi Guys.Any idea about a macro that could take a patched unit and swop the DMX address with another.Would be used when units have been rigged the wrong way round so just shopping units 4 and 5 around for example.Many thanks in advance.
